meta.title: Clean placeholder copy in vendors dashboard error card
meta.summary: Remove placeholder language from the vendors dashboard error-rate card and replace it with production-ready copy, with lint/typecheck verification.
goals: Replace placeholder wording in the vendors dashboard error-rate card with production-ready copy.
Keep the displayed metric and impacted vendor names unchanged unless explicitly requested.
Confirm no “placeholder” text remains in apps/web/app/vendors/page.tsx.
Validate the change with npm --prefix apps/web run lint and npm --prefix apps/web run typecheck.
